Nov. 1, 1903 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Lortzing
Ballarat Oval, Ballarat, Victoria, Australia Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £75, 3rd £40, 4th £20. National championship run as part of the Royal South Street Eisteddfod.
First Australian Championship to be held at Ballarat Ungraded Championship
Feb. 16, 2016, 4:33 a.m. May 25, 2020, 7:56 a.m.
